_fields.XSPMSP: Sorry, you cannot manage your Kaspersky Lab subscription on the Kaspersky website. To manage your subscription please go to the Provider Portal
_fields.XSPMSP_BESTBUY: Sorry, you cannot manage your Kaspersky Lab subscription on the Kaspersky website. To manage your subscription please go to the Provider Portal
_fields.ECOMM:
You have a subscription license which cannot be renewed on www.kaspersky.com.  

If you have enabled the Auto-Renewal Plan your subscription will be renewed automatically prior to expiration and you will receive at least one email reminder informing you of when your license will be extended. To manage your subscription, cancel the Auto-Renewal Plan or update your payment details please log into your Account.

If you have cancelled the Auto-Renewal Plan you can renew your subscription manually in your Account preferences.

To find more details on our Auto-Renewal Plan please click here.
_fields.ECOMM_MYKASPERSKY:
You have a subscription license which cannot be renewed on www.kaspersky.com.  

If you have enabled the Auto-Renewal Plan your subscription will be renewed automatically prior to expiration and you will receive at least one email reminder informing you of when your license will be extended. To manage your subscription, cancel the Auto-Renewal Plan or update your payment details please log into My Kaspersky Account.

If you have cancelled the Auto-Renewal Plan you can renew your subscription manually in your My Kaspersky account preferences.

To find more details on our Auto-Renewal Plan please click here.
_fields.NO_PRICING_OPTIONS:
Sorry, you cannot renew you license at the moment, please return when your license is due for renewal in 'xx' days.

Alternatively, you can buy a new license in our Online Store
_fields.KSC_FAM_UNKNOWN: Sorry, you cannot manage your Kaspersky Lab subscription on the Kaspersky website. To manage your subscription please go to Provider Portal.
_fields.lrcInvalidFormat: Invalid format! The license information that you enter must be in the format XXXX-XXXXXX-XXXXXXXX. Please try again.
_fields.lrcInvalidSerial: You may have made a mistake when entering your License information. Please try entering it again.
_fields.cookieDesc: We use cookies to make your experience of our websites better. By using and further navigating this website you accept this. Detailed information about the use of cookies on this website is available by clicking on more information.
